html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09722023-10-06PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARY ANNE V. CHAMBERS, O.Ont., of Markham, Ontario, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years,in the place of Marian K. Brown, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARY ANNE V. CHAMBERS, O.Ont., of Markham, Ontario, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years,in the place of Marian K. Brown, whose term has expired.
